# 𒉇 => 𒌆

𒉇 NAM2 NAM₂ MU₄ ⇔ 𒈫 MIN 𒌋𒌋 MAN 2 𓏠𓋴 ⋍ 𓋳 巾 jīn
𒉇 NAM₂ 𒌋𒌋 MAN "lord" 𒉇 NAM₂ mens mind (fore)thought, plan(ning); understanding; instruction 𒉇 NAM2 ≠ 𒌆 TU two TÚG² Tuch textile 𒁲 DI
𒉇 TUG₂ TU₉

Derived signs
𒋸 tibir₄ < 𒋳 TAG ⇔ 𒉇 TUG₂
𒎏 NIN < 𒊩𒉇 MUN+NAM2 𒊩𒈠 ≠ 𒁮 dame

𒉇 UMUŠ 𓏠𓋴 𓋳 ⇔ 𒌆 mu₄, mur to dress, clothe oneself, wear
𒉇 UŠ₄ 𓋴𓏠 𓋳
𒉇 AZLAG₂ Auslage
